title: Add sample of drawing Maxwell Triangle by GLES2
message:
Add sample of drawing Maxwell Triangle by GLES2

Adding 3 ways to draw maxwell triangle:
1) Basic simple way.
2) Put position data and color data in a single
Vertex data set.
3) Use GLBuffer APIs and static draw.
